titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3924) to authorize telecommuting for Federal contractors.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-381, by Mr. Sessions.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3924 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Bill is open to amendments. Allows the chairman of the Committee of the Whole to accord priority in recognition to those members who have pre-printed their amendments in the Congressional Record.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 134.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 373.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/20/2002--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 3924 (telecommuting for Federal contractors).
